name: xBooster Social Icons with Counter
author: acbaltaci

sections.description:
Have you met xBooster?

It made to boost your WordPress site’s social network functionality and look ! WordPress 3.8 Compatible!

Unlimited social profiles!

Yes! You can create unlimited number of social networks. xBooster full edition comes with 15 most popular Social Networks :

Blogger
Delicious
Digg
Facebook
Flickr
Google Plus
Instapaper
LinkedIn
Pinterest
Reddit
Stumbleupon
Tumblr
Twitter
Vimeo
Youtube

This one just with Facebook and Twitter

xBooster Social Plugin helps you to manage your social networks.

Take over the control of the social networks on your website!

Take a look to the demo of xBooster Social Plugin.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload xBooster Social Plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Thats all, you can customize the plugin by opening the Settings > xBooster Social Plugin
sections.faq:
Can i place this to spesific locations on theme files

Yes. Use the do_shortcode trick of the wordpress.

Can i add new social network profiles?

Yes.

Can i use PNG or other file formats instead of SVG?

Yes. Use custom icon fields for each social network on xBooster Social Plugin settings pages.
